snippet.title: Bitter Belief - Metroidvania game trailer
snippet.description:
This is the official trailer of a good #indie #metroidvania which has a twist story and a hint of difficulty. 
Available on Steam: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2163760/Bitter_Belief/ 
#pixelart #gameplay #gamergirl #gaming #gamedev #metroidvania #steam
